SELECT unlog.*, pda.description as pda_description, pu.user_name as pda_user_name, equ.name AS equipment_name, pi.serial_number AS port_Index FROM lock_unlock_log unlog inner JOIN lock_pda_user pu ON pu.id = unlog.pda_user_id inner JOIN lock_pda_info pda ON pda.id = pu.pda_id inner JOIN lock_port_info pi ON pi.id = unlog.port_id inner JOIN lock_equipment equ ON pi.equipment_id = equ.id
AND unlog.status =#{status}
AND pu.user_name like CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%')
AND pi.user_code like CONCAT('%',#{lockSerialNumber},'%')
order by unlog.create_time desc
